summary.para: A component for masking Sprites and Particles.
By default it will mask all Sorting Layers. A custom range of Sorting Layers can be set. If a SortingGroup is present, it will act local to the SortingGroup.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpriteMask.alphaCutoff
member.summary: The minimum alpha value used by the mask to select the area of influence defined over the mask's sprite.

summary.para: Unique ID of the sorting layer defining the end of the custom range.
Sprites sorted after this sorting layer will not be masked.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpriteMask.backSortingOrder
member.summary: Order within the back sorting layer defining the end of the custom range.

summary.para: Unique ID of the sorting layer defining the start of the custom range.
Sprites sorted before this sorting layer will not be masked.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpriteMask.frontSortingOrder
member.summary: Order within the front sorting layer defining the start of the custom range.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpriteMask.isCustomRangeActive
member.summary: Mask sprites from front to back sorting values only.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.SpriteMask.sprite
member.summary: The Sprite used to define the mask.
